title: Smart quotes and extended characters rendering as question marks in diamonds
creator: mmmix
content: Incoming messages that contain smart (curly) quotes or other extended characters are rendered as 3 question marks in diamonds on Thunderbird for Android. On the Windows Thunderbird app, the email renders correctly.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:144.0) Gecko/20100101 Thunderbird/144.0.1

title: Where is the manual?
creator: jidanni
content:
I'm looking for the Thunderbird for Android user manual. Is there something like that available to read? All I found was scattered FAQs.

No, I don't have a specific question. I just want to read the whole manual.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android;kb_visits_prior:["/en-US/kb/getting-started-thunderbird-android"];solver_id:420969

title: Split-screen view not actioning on pixel 9 pro fold unfolded display
creator: gibsgiblet
content:
As per the title, since a recent update the split screen view when in landscape is not correctly applying when a pixel 9 pro fold is unfolded.

I can get it to work if I use it in landscape but doesnt work as it used to when normally unfolded.

Bug or am I missing something?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/141.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Android

title: Thunderbird for Android
creator: francois_henri
content:
I'm using Thunderbird on my laptop for years, I've never been able to use it on my S22 Samsung mobile (Android).

Explanation After the App installation, I did export my profile from my laptop using the QR Scanner on my phone. Since then, whenever I try to send an email, it remains in my draft and is never sent. I'm not even receiving emails. I cannot see any of my email folders.

Therefore nothing work, the only thing that seems to have been imported in my phone is my adress book. If that can help, my email address is .....@outlook. com.

Thank you for your support.

Francois
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/141.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;kb_visits_prior:["/en-US/kb/getting-started-thunderbird-android"]
